code_files.context_snippet:
def test_extfile(self) -> None:
        with pki.ext_file(['proxy.py']) as config_path:
            with open(config_path, 'rb') as config:
                self.assertEqual(
                    config.read(),
                    b'\nsubjectAltName=DNS:proxy.py',
                )
